amendment.description: At the end of the bill, before the short title, insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available in this Act to the United States Army Corps of Engineers may be used for sediment or soil dumping into the Missouri River.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds by the United States Army Corps of Engineers for sediment or soil dumping into the Missouri River.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A070) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A070) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A070) offered by Mr. King (IA).
